TextBlock.Text: Structure: Two-sided reinforced chamber with no physical entrances
Amount of gravity crystals needed to construct the gravity floors should be communciated to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon!
Chamber is to be equipped with projection pool and wall to facilitate swift communication of information with Nomai on the surface.
Crafting of new projection stones is to be conveyed to Daz at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop.</color>
CASSAVA: I shall be returning to Statue Island soon. I would be happy to convey this message to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> during my visit!
PRIVET: Of course you would. Send Daz my regards, Cassava!
